name: BollywoodFacts
0:
”Alexa ask bollywood facts”
”Alexa open bollywood facts”
”Alexa Load bollywood facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bollywood facts
des:
Use the skill to know interesting facts about Bollywood or Indian Film Industry

Example: "Alexa, ask Bollywood facts"

Example Response: "Here's your fact: Ashok Kumar was a lab assistant in Bombay Talkies before he became an actor in 1936."

There will many more interesting facts you will get to know while using the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
